elements.name: section_header_teaching_with_ai
elements.html: Using Artificial Intelligence to Teach and Learn Computer Science

elements.name: section_teaching_with_ai
elements.html: The following are questions about your experience and interests in using Artificial Intelligence (AI) to support you while teaching Computer Science. Your responses will inform our priorities around tool development.

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_ta_matrix
elements.title: How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements about using an AI-assisted tool to assess and evaluate students' computer science projects?
elements.description: Such a tool uses AI to check students' work against a rubric, assessing progress toward learning outcomes and standards.

rows.text: I am familiar with AI-assisted tools to assess and evaluate students' work
I would use an AI-assisted tool to support me in assessing and evaluating students' computer science projects

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_ta_rating
elements.title: How likely are you to use an AI-assisted tool to assess and evaluate students' computer science projects?
elements.description: Such a tool uses AI to check students' work against a rubric, assessing progress toward learning outcomes and standards.

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_ta_reasons_not_use
elements.title: Please share the reasons why you wouldn't use an AI-assisted tool to assess and evaluate students' computer science projects. Understanding your answer will help us find how to improve the tool and supports.

choices.text: I would like to understand how the tool works before using it
I am not familiar with AI-assisted tools to assess and evaluate students' work
I don't trust that the tool will assess student work as well as I can
I know my students, so my assessments include context that tools can't consider
I'm nervous about introducing AI into my teaching practices
My school restricts access to AI tools

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_ta_reasons_not_use_other_comment
elements.title: Please share what are some other reasons why you wouldn't use an AI-assisted tool to assess and evaluate students' computer science projects.

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_pl_tutor_matrix
elements.title: How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements about using an AI-assisted tool to guide and support you while teaching computer science?
elements.description: E.g. A tool that gives you suggestions for activities based on the lesson you are teaching, guidance on how to introduce differentiation practices,  develop guided questions to encourage critical thinking, etc.

rows.text: I would be interested in using an AI-assisted tool to guide and support me while teaching computer science
I would be comfortable using an AI-assisted tool to guide and support me while teaching computer science

elements.name: teaching_with_ai_cs_tutor_matrix
elements.title: How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements about enabling your students to use an AI-assisted tool to support their computer science learning, such as an AI tutor?
elements.description: This would be an AI-powered tool for students that can deliver content and guidance, personalized hints, feedback, and encouragement on CS concepts as students work through their projects.

rows.text: I am familiar with AI-assisted tools to support student learning
I would be interested in providing my students AI-assisted tools to support their learning of computer science
I would be comfortable with the use of AI-assisted tools by my students to support their learning of computer science
